analysis.key_quote: The federal workforce has already become way too politicized with so many career civil servants seeing their jobs eliminated or being replaced by someone else who is perceived to be more politically loyal.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed regulation by highlighting concerns about the politicization of the federal workforce and the potential for experienced civil servants to be replaced based on political loyalty, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and politicization.
